channel.title: Dragon Warhammer and Dragon Crossbow!
channel.description:
I remember reading a little while ago the Q&A stuff Jagex had, and I read that the d warhammer and d cbow are going to be coming out. To be prepared, I'm getting about 30-40M on my pure and getting some stats like 60 attack and like 76 range. Hopefully there won't be a big quest like "While Guthix Sleeps", or any defense quest :P
Are you guys getting ready or anything?

item.title: Dragon Warhammer and Dragon Crossbow!
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

[quote=“Love, post:8, topic:319441”]I forgot about this Grandmaster business.
Now there isn’t a doubt in my mind you have to complete a quest for these items.[/quote]

Same here. I’m really hoping there is, I don’t want to see pures running around with extremely strong weapons all the time. Dragon claws are powerful enough. Once again though, that opinion changes depending on how strong the weapon is and the features of it.

Read full topic

item.title: Dragon Warhammer and Dragon Crossbow!
item.dc:creator: @I_C_Y_Pure Love
item.description:
@I_C_Y_Pure wrote:

I forgot about this Grandmaster business.
Now there isn’t a doubt in my mind you have to complete a quest for these items.

Read full topic

item.title: Dragon Warhammer and Dragon Crossbow!
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

I remember that Q&A as well, however I actually do hope they require a quest. Dragon claws requiring only 60 attack are pretty over powered if you get lucky, imagine the crossbow on bosses and such. Depending on how fast the weapon shoots, it’s damage, and it’s efficiency will depend on the price and what it requires. I just hope they don’t fuck it up like the rest of the updates.

They also mentioned a new grandmaster quest, perhaps this would be the reward.

Read full topic

item.title: Dragon Warhammer and Dragon Crossbow!
item.dc:creator: @I_C_Y_Pure Love
item.description:
@I_C_Y_Pure wrote:

However, it still is going to be a huge update, ‘dragon weapon’ is made to be so amazingly good, to persuade F2P to become P2P, so I guess really it’s just a waiting game.

Read full topic

item.title: Dragon Warhammer and Dragon Crossbow!
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

[quote=“Love, post:4, topic:319441”][quote author=pk3r john link=topic=415907.msg3059548#msg3059548 date=1260746202]

I’m going to assume, that one of these, if not both, are going to require a stat\quest that a pure won’t be able to go through.

This is assuming JaGex’s everlasting hatred toward ‘Pures’.

If not, defense, it will be prayer, if not prayer, it will be a quest, that requires one of the two.

None the less, even if not, a warhammer doesn’t sound to appealing, but the crossbow sounds orgasmic thinking of the damage being able to be applied.

Mm, hopefully though it’ll be available for pures, but pray > def. Warhammer sounds like claws, claws were horrible before dclaws, and then when dclaws came out… I’m thinking the same might happen with the hammer
[/quote]

A good observation, but let’s face it, unless they change the whole meaning to a ‘warhammer’ meaning, type of attack \ speed etc, the weapon itself is just too slow, and since it uses a ‘SMASH’ attack type, which nearly all armour is highly resistant too, it’s ridiculously biased.[/quote]

Ooh didn’t think of that.

Read full topic

@I_C_Y_Pure wrote:

[quote=“pk3r john, post:3, topic:319441”][quote author=Love link=topic=415907.msg3059545#msg3059545 date=1260746007]
I’m going to assume, that one of these, if not both, are going to require a stat\quest that a pure won’t be able to go through.

This is assuming JaGex’s everlasting hatred toward ‘Pures’.

If not, defense, it will be prayer, if not prayer, it will be a quest, that requires one of the two.

None the less, even if not, a warhammer doesn’t sound to appealing, but the crossbow sounds orgasmic thinking of the damage being able to be applied.
[/quote]

Mm, hopefully though it’ll be available for pures, but pray > def. Warhammer sounds like claws, claws were horrible before dclaws, and then when dclaws came out… I’m thinking the same might happen with the hammer[/quote]

A good observation, but let’s face it, unless they change the whole meaning to a ‘warhammer’ meaning, type of attack \ speed etc, the weapon itself is just too slow, and since it uses a ‘SMASH’ attack type, which nearly all armour is highly resistant too, it’s ridiculously biased.
